I'm getting real sick and tired of the utterly retarded issue of disease, homosexuality and marriage. Many aganist the marriage claim homosexuality's higher risk of disease is grounds to deny marriage. Pathetic. Diseases is not grounds to deny or stop marriage in virtually any region or any state or any country. They also ignore that the majority of people WITH dieases are not gays. Straight can get diseases like gays, yet they aren't calling for straights with dieases and straights with very promiscous lifestyles to be denied marriage. Doublestandard to say the utmost least. In addition, they refuse to support sexual education, as well as condoms and refuse to admit that marriage is a known partner reducer. They say they are aganist the spread of diease yet offer NO solutions to stopping it, even OBSTRUCTING known, proven solutions. 
 
 IF you are going to argue that gays should be denied marriage on the grounds of diease, you must therefore argue that straights must be too, as well as those who contract a diease must have their marriage nullified. 
 
 Diseases has no revelance towards marriage so stop using it as a argument.
just as I suspected. completely ignored by the those who rely on lies, majority oppression and fallacies.
C'mon, PROVE TO ME why we should ban gay marriage on the grounds of diease but not straight marriage on the same grounds.
how is it that people still use the diease fallacy yet will not come here to debate how it applies to gays, but not straights?

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Disease is irrevelant to marriage
